block.field: Based on the Ren'py example script https://www.renpy.org/
Well, professor Eileen's lecture was interesting.
But to be honest, I couldn't concentrate on it very much.
I had a lot of other thoughts on my mind.
And they all ended up with a question.
A question, I've been meaning to ask someone.
When we came out of the university, I saw her.
I've known her ever since we were children.
And she's always been a good friend.
More just talking... more than just walking home together when our classes ended.
Oh, hi, do we walk home together?
I said and my voice was already shaking.
We reached the meadows just outside our hometown.
When we were children, we often played here.
She turned to me and smiled.
Will you be my artist for a visual novel?
Sure, but what is a 'visual novel?'
It's a story with pictures and music.
And you'll be able to make choices that influence the outcome of the story.
So it's like those choose-your-adventure books?
Exactly! I plan on making a small romantic story.
And I figured you could help me... since I know how you like to draw.
Well, I can try. I hope I don't disappoint you.
You can't disappoint me, you know that.
And so, we became a visual novel creating team.
We made games and had a lot of fun making them.
Well, apart from that Boy's Love game she insisted on making.
See? We've been making romantic visual novels, spending time together, helping each other....
... and when you give love to others, love will come to you.
I know. So, will you marry me?
Ummm, of course I will. I've actually been meaning to ask you, but since you brought it up...
I know, but you are so indecisive, that I thought I'd take the initiative.
I guess... It's all about asking the right question... at the right time.
It is. But now, stop being theoretical, and give me a kiss!
And we got married shortly after that.
In fact, we made many more visual novels.
And together, we lived happily ever after.
Why it's a game with lots of sex.
You mean, like a boy's love game?
I've always wanted to make one of those.
And so I decided to ask her later.
I couldn't ask her that day, and I couldn't ask her later.
I guess I will never know now.
